value.string: ***************************Its a master bot which integrates all the other subbots**********************************
*****************************************In case of failure while finding/entering to a field, ERROR flag will be raised and BOT may be stopped********************************
****************************If Send Email Command Fails,assign the send email retry logic variable to true*****************************************

Hi Team,
 
Due to an unknown exception, the BOT stopped the processing.

Kindly check the issue and then restart the BOT.

Thanks, 
Automated Bulk Skilling BOT
